faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: You Got Questions, We Got Answers

questions.a: This is the corresponding answer for Question 1. You can find detailed information about our services, pricing, and booking policies here.
This is the corresponding answer for Question 2. Our platform offers instant confirmation for most venue bookings, subject to real-time availability checks with the restaurant's system.
This is the corresponding answer for Question 3. We support various payment methods, including Stripe, Apple Pay, and Google Pay, ensuring a secure and seamless transaction process.
This is the corresponding answer for Question 4. You can modify or cancel your booking through your user dashboard, provided it meets the venue's cancellation policy cutoff time.
This is the corresponding answer for Question 5. Our recommendation engine uses your location, past preferences, and popularity data to suggest the best dining options for you right now.
This is the corresponding answer for Question 6. We partner only with premium venues that meet our strict quality and service standards, ensuring a luxurious experience every time.
This is the corresponding answer for Question 7. Yes, our platform is fully optimized for mobile browsing, allowing you to discover and book venues effortlessly on any device.
